title: Scam alert : media monks
selftext:
Hi , I wanted to report a scam by  an entity called media monks. I got a whatsapp message offering a job for posting reviews on Google and getting 150 inr per posts. I knew it from beginning that it is a scam and decided to take some details and block them . 

Now I am getting video calls from USA numbers and continuous spam messages on WhatsApp.

Please suggest how have you guys Handled this.
comments: You missed 150 rs. Someone earlier posted same scam. He managed to get 150 rs and blocked the contactÂ
Don't get why people don't block such numbers, instead of playing with them.
